venue.name: Wild Rover Bar Boston - 1 Block from Faneuil Hall

item.description:
Hey everyone, I'm pre-launching a new Meetup group focused on professional networking. Check it out:

Click to see Boston Professional Networkers

 

Networking is all about building strong alliances. It’s a proactive approach of gathering information about a particular company or career field, and it begins in your own backyard. Most people are happy to share advice, so don’t be shy. Reach out and make a connection.

Networking is a powerful way to learn about your area of interest and to begin meeting more people in the field. It's also is a two-way street. Share advice and help others as you move along in your career.

Bring some business cards, a smile and a professional attitude because it's time to make some valuable new business contacts. Dress code is "business casual", professional, yet comfortable. Let's kick Boston Professional Networkers off the right way: $10 cover gets you 2 tickets for the Cocktail Hour from 7 to 8 pm (valid until 8:30, cash bar afterward) and food is available for the duration of the event.

Driving? You Need Parking:

Street parking is possible but it can be tough. Otherwise there is a parking garage nearby at 47 Broad Street. CLICK HERE for a coupon to park for $10. You must PRINT OUT the coupon at bring it with you to the garage for the discount.

Taking The T? Here's The Stop:

The closet T stop is the Aquarium stop on the Blue line, and you would take the State Street exit. The next easiest T stop would be State Street stop on the Orange line.
item.name: Official Group Launch for Boston Professional Networking w/ Happy Hour & Food
